row.process:
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.ECHO_ON_OFF :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH
!-------------------------------------Logging input parameters------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "HPQC HOST URL" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_HPQC_BASE_URL#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Auth Token" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_HPQC_AUTH_TOKEN#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
!------------------------------------------ Buidling java arguments -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- :SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ACTION_NAME# = "LOGOUT"
:DEFINE &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#, string, 6
: SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[1] = "-action" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_HPQC_ACTION_NAME#" : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[2] = "&UC4RB_HPQC_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[3] = "-baseurl" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_HPQC_BASE_URL#" : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[4] = "&UC4RB_HPQC_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[5] = "-authtokenid" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_HPQC_AUTH_TOKEN#" : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[6] = "&UC4RB_HPQC_OPTION_VALUE#"
!------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PRV.INCLUDE.BUILD_JAVA_ARGUMENTS
! Setting execution environment : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.SET_EXEC_ENVIRONMENT
! Invoking java binary java -jar &UC4RB_HPQC_PATH_JAR# &UC4RB_HPQC_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#
! Status messages :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** LOGOUT ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** LOGOUT ACTION FAILED ********"
!------------------------------------------ Error Handling ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS

row.post_process: :SET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,,"RETCODE") :IF &STATUS# = 0 : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_AUTH_TOKEN# = "" : PUBLISH &UC4RB_HPQC_AUTH_TOKEN#,,"TOP" : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_BASE_URL# = "" : PUBLISH &UC4RB_HPQC_BASE_URL#,,"TOP" : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_USERNAME# = "" : PUBLISH &UC4RB_HPQC_USERNAME#,,"TOP" :ENDIF
